1.content:
Hey! My name is Josh, and I'm starting my first day of Hey High School. I just transferred here, on account of my parents moving because of their new jobs. When I first visited Hey High Sch-...

Wait, did someone seriously name this school Hey High School? If you took away the "High School", it would just be Hey. As in someone from another school asking you, "So what school do you attend?"

And you'd be like, "Hey."

How much of an idiot would you sound like if you answered that type of question with a response similair to that of hi, hello, or I notice you standing there in front of me?

Ahem.

Anyway, I entered my homeroom and took my seat before any of the other students arrived. Way before, actually. Homeroom stated at 8:15....it's 8:30, and not even the teacher is here. Maybe I read something wrong. Oh crap, maybe this isn't my homeroom.

I finally decided to...
1.title: Hey High School

11.content:
I sat there waiting.

...and waiting...



.......and waiting....




...a bead of sweat dripped down the side of my forehead. My first day of school, and I'm sitting in an empty classroom like a moron.

Suddenly, the door finally opened, and in came...
11.title: Sit and wait

113.content:
A group of tough-looking jocks waltzed into the room.

Literally.

A bouncy, old-fashioned waltz music played from the hallway, and the tough guys waltzed in, all the way to their designated seats.

I couldn't help but laugh at what must have been a joke on my account.

I bet they know I'm the new guy. This is some joke to make me feel out of place. I bet they were all like, "Hey this guy is gonna be sooo weirded out when he sees all of us waltzing into the room. He's totally gonna wanna join us waltzing, and we'll be all like, sorry loser but you have to join the walzting club."

That's when my laugh garnered the attention of...
113.title: A ton of students

info.brief_description: You're a new student surrounded by delinquents, who aren't as tough or smart as they seem.
info.description:
I imagined a funny story about delinquent high school students, and I intended for it to be a mixture of high school satire and pop culture references.

You are Josh, the new senior at Hey High School, attending there because your parents found a better job and had to move. You find out upon being there, that it is a high school loaded to the brim with delinquents and troubled teenagers.

The longer you're there, though, the more you realise how not-so-tough they really are.

It's intended to be goofy, keep it around the PG-13 area, and please just don't do any "you're dead" directions where the story suddenly stops.

Other than that, have fun!!

HINT: Think of people you knew in high school.
